synopsis:
Playtime ends at the five o'clock chime. And there comes the indefinable time between vanishing playtime and dinner time at home. Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation by Saki Muramoto.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)
